description:
But first on Sportsworld this Saturday, just two months after stepping in as host, Equatorial Guinea kicked off the Africa Cup of Nations, with a 1-1 draw against Congo-Brazzaville in BATA. Africa's biggest stars are competing all for the next few weeks to discover who will be crowned champions. And on my Sportsworld team, I was joined by a couple of nations' semifinalists, with Ghana John Paintsil and South Africa's 1996 champion Shaun Bartlett. Ivory Coast last won the tournament back in 1992, but Shaun Bartlett told me he thinks there is a huge weight of expectation for them to go on and lift the title, and for Manchester City's midfielder Yaya Touré to carry them to victory.

"I think obviously along with the most expensive striker, now are going to Man City as well as Borne, I think the two of them will become the nation's aspirations for us winning the tournaments' consent. But Yaya Touré has been phenomenal over the last six to eight years. And obviously winning African Player of the Year again, this justifies and shows what top player he is and what qualities he's got then. It will be a big miss for Manchester City, but I think Ivory Coast will be hoping that he can win this summer and the tournament for them."

title: 王者风范（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

冯曦妤，（Fiona Fung ）是一名香港歌手兼作词人，以歌声清脆而著名。1999年，16岁的冯曦妤加入陈光荣的音乐室，开始参与电影的配乐以及和音演唱的幕后工作。 2007年，她决定由幕后转移至幕前，并于2008年加盟SONY BMG进军乐坛，以冯曦妤作为艺名。比较出名的作品有《再见警察》，《我在那一角落患过伤风》，《a little love 》，《阳光. 雨》等。

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Proud of you

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

     

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Private
Private means something belongs to a particular person, and is not meant to be shared with everyone else. What is private? Why is it private?
This week's topic: They intended to keep it private... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) private property, no trespassing
2) keep the information private
3) a private meeting
4) a private bathroom
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

He walked into the lobby of the private club, the one with golden letter of “Members Only” on the door. The staff behind the desk looked up and nodded. Al returned the nod, and proceeded towards the locker room. There was nobody else in the room. Al walked towards a specific locker and opened the locker. Inside, there was a manilla envelope. After picking it up, Al shifted the envelope between his two hands. The item was not too thick, but it was slightly on the heavy side. He put the object into his bag before leaving the locker room.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
